name: Ms. Ana Marie Cruz
subject: All Subjects
bio: Ms. Cruz specializes in early childhood education and has been teaching Grade 1 for 5 years. She creates a warm, engaging classroom where young learners feel safe to explore and grow.

name: Mr. Roberto Fernandez
subject: Mathematics & Science
bio: Mr. Fernandez brings 8 years of teaching experience with a focus on making math and science fun and accessible. His interactive teaching style helps students develop strong foundational skills.

name: Ms. Liza Mae Reyes
subject: English & Filipino
bio: Ms. Reyes is passionate about literacy and language development. With 6 years of experience, she helps students become confident readers and effective communicators in both English and Filipino.

name: Mr. Jose Miguel Torres
subject: Social Studies & MAPEH
bio: Mr. Torres combines his love for history, arts, and physical education to create well-rounded learning experiences. He has been inspiring Grade 4 students for 7 years.

name: Ms. Carmen Dela Cruz
subject: Science & Technology
bio: Ms. Dela Cruz holds a degree in Biology and brings real-world science into the classroom. Her hands-on experiments and technology integration make learning exciting for Grade 5 students.

name: Mr. Daniel Santos
subject: Mathematics & Computer
bio: Mr. Santos prepares Grade 6 students for high school with advanced math concepts and computer literacy. His 9 years of experience help students build confidence for their next educational journey.

name: Ms. Patricia Gonzales
subject: Early Childhood Education
bio: Ms. Gonzales specializes in kindergarten education with 12 years of experience. She creates a playful, nurturing environment where young children develop social skills and a love for learning.

name: Mr. Rafael Mendoza
subject: Science & Mathematics
bio: Mr. Mendoza brings innovative teaching methods to Grade 4, making complex concepts accessible through hands-on experiments and real-world applications. He has been teaching for 6 years.
